note:
Website: https://21cccs.org/

Address: 221 Blue Spruce Way, Murrysville, PA 15668

Phone: 484-875-5400

Cyber schools in PA have come a long way thanks to 21st Century Cyber Charter School. 21CCCS was established in 2001 for Pennsylvania students in grades 6 through 12 that require online learning. 21CCCS features the best academic track record of any cyber charter school in PA, including average SAT scores in the top 5% of all Pennsylvania public schools.
